Name: Shunned Nanomancer

Damage.Description: Victims have to test Toughness or bleed 1 HP for d6 rounds.

Cyberware.Name: Milk-white eyes that see through lies

Feature.FeatureText: Once per day, when you believe you've been lied to, test Presence DR8. On a success, you can tell whenever the target lies for the rest of the day.

Cyberware.Name: Rockskin
Cyberware.DescText: You have burnt orange, stone-like skin.

Feature.FeatureText: -d4 damage taken, not subject to being reduced on a defense fumble. Instead, you take an additional 1d8 damage as part of your skin is ripped off.

Cyberware.Name: An abdominal mouth
Cyberware.Description: A second mouth where your navel used to be
Cyberware.DescText: You have a second mouth where your navel used to be.

Feature.FeatureText: Any food or drugs consumed with your navel-mouth are twice as effective.

Cyberware.Name: A crystalline skull
Cyberware.Description: An elongated, pointed and semi-translucent skull
Cyberware.DescText: You have an elongated, pointed and semi-translucent skull, under which your brain shines, emitting light like a candle

Feature.FeatureText: Your brain shines underneath, emitting light like that of a candle.

Cyberware.Name: Scales
Cyberware.Description: Scales cover most of your body.
Cyberware.DescText: Scales cover most of your body.

Feature.FeatureText: Any roll to resist cold, heat or radiation is -4DR.

Cyberware.Name: Redundant organs
Cyberware.Description: A second set of some vital organs.

Feature.FeatureText: Any hit that would bring you to 0 or less HP has a 50% chance of bringing you to just 1 HP. But any medical bill to restore you to life is doubled.

Cyberware.Name: An extra large body
Cyberware.Description: You have an extra large and dense body. You gain d10 additional HP (included). Clothes and armor have to be specially made to order for twice the normal price.
Cyberware.DescText: You have an extra large and dense body.

ClassLore: It's inside you. Infesting your brain, warping your flesh. People are afraid of you now. They're afraid of the power that poisons you. You're scared too.
RandomClassLore: you spent a wild night with a group of neo-pagan cultists, performing profane rites to some snake god
a star fell close to your building and you were a curious child
you found drugs. Free drugs. They were neither drugs nor entirely free
you were kidnapped and subjected to horrible experiments
you flatlined in an alley and was brought back by a hooded stranger
you were subjected to a week long exorcism
you were locked inside a flooded Laketon basement for 3 days
